content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time data or recent studies. However, digital check-in systems are designed to enhance efficient service delivery and improve passenger experience but may not necessarily lead to a reduction in luggage loss. Factors such as baggage handling, baggage screening, and baggage tracking systems all contribute significantly to the probability of lost luggage incidents. In recent years, airlines have implemented innovative baggage tracking devices and platforms that alert passengers when their luggage is offloaded from the aircraft to the baggage carousel, which may contribute to a reduction in the number of lost luggage incidents at airports.
